meanings.definition: Experience or cause to experience a slight prickling or stinging sensation.
meanings.sent1: After sitting in the sun for hours, my skin tingled with warmth.
meanings.sent2: The cold wind made my cheeks tingle.
meanings.sent3: The tickling sensation from the feather made me tingle all over.
meanings.sent4: The excitement of the roller coaster ride made her whole body tingle with anticipation.
meanings.sent5: The spicy food made his tongue tingle with heat.

meanings.definition: Feel a sensation as of many tiny prickles on the skin.
meanings.sent1: The sensation of ants crawling on my skin made it tingle.
meanings.sent2: The feeling of the grass on my bare feet made me tingle all over.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected touch of the feather caused my skin to tingle.
meanings.sent4: The electric shock made my whole body tingle for a moment.
meanings.sent5: The icy water made my skin tingle with cold.
